snippet.title: Haven - Teaser
snippet.description:
They escaped to a lost planet to be together.
Wish list on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/983970/Haven/
More info here: https://www.thegamebakers.com/haven/
Join our Discord here: https://discordapp.com/invite/U2DZHxB
- - -
Play as two lovers who escaped to a lost planet. 
The only thing that matters is to stay together. 
From the creators of Furi.
A RPG to play solo or with a special someone.
Coming to PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation and Xbox Game Pass in 2020.
Original music by Danger -  ℗ 2019 1789 - © 1789 http://2emedanger.com/
